title: My site
content:
Hi! I want to represent you my site.
[url=http://www.stipepolls.blogspot.com/]www.stipepolls.blogspot.com/[/url]
You can suggest your idea about making new poll and I may add it.
You can even leave a comment if you want to.
Thanks for support!
Stipe ;-)

title: Re: My site
content:
Uh oh.. You're right LL.. Let us pray that there will be no fight over the title of poll master.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
